welcomeMessage: Welcome to our Chinese restaurant! Enjoy our special promotions this week:
monday: Monday: 20% off on all Dim Sum dishes.
wednesday: Wednesday: Buy three, get one free on Kung Pao Chicken.
friday: Friday: Free dessert with any order over $30.
weekendSpecial: Weekend Special: 30% off on Peking Duck and Szechuan Beef.
dontMissOut: Donâ€™t miss out on these amazing deals!

Kung Pao Chicken.title: Kung Pao Chicken
Kung Pao Chicken.description: A spicy, stir-fried Chinese dish made with chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers. Known for its bold flavors and balance of sweet and savory.

Sweet and Sour Pork.title: Sweet and Sour Pork
Sweet and Sour Pork.description: A classic Chinese dish featuring tender pieces of pork coated in a tangy sweet and sour sauce, served with colorful bell peppers and pineapple.

Mapo Tofu.title: Mapo Tofu
Mapo Tofu.description: A traditional Sichuan dish made with tofu set in a spicy chili and bean-based sauce, typically containing minced meat, usually pork or beef.

Mark Johnson.name: Mark Johnson
Mark Johnson.description: Mark Johnson is passionate about delivering authentic Chinese cuisine with a modern twist. His dedication to culinary arts shines through in every dish he creates.

Emma Grosh.name: Emma Grosh
Emma Grosh.description: Emma Grosh brings a wealth of experience in Chinese culinary traditions. Her innovative approach to flavors ensures each meal is a delightful experience.

Laura Stegner.name: Laura Stegner
Laura Stegner.description: Laura Stegner blends traditional Chinese cooking techniques with contemporary tastes, crafting dishes that are both comforting and adventurous.

Patrick Pool.name: Patrick Pool
Patrick Pool.description: Patrick Pool's expertise in Chinese gastronomy brings a unique flair to every dish he prepares. His commitment to quality and authenticity is unparalleled.
